Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic, Russell Westbrook match triple-doubles as Nuggets hold off short-handed Nets
Pre-Game Insights: Fernandez has a hunger and an appetite for learning and growing, and his ability to just relate and get along with the players
Post-Match Reflections: Fernandez said, “Once you do your job, there’s no friends,” and the same way he wants to beat the Nuggets, they’re going to want to beat him
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fernandez spent two seasons with the Kings before taking the top job in Brooklyn, where he has navigated constant roster instability in his debut season
The Nets traded veteran guard Dennis Schroder to Golden State in mid-December
Two weeks later, they traded Dorian Finney-Smith and Shake Milton to the Lakers, taking back D’Angelo Russell (and stockpiling draft picks)
Others: Fernandez was warmly received by old friends at Ball Arena, Malone’s competitiveness has rubbed off on him
